name: Cool
description:
Demy is back! He went on a hiking trip! Play as Demy the demon who got stuck in a snowstorm. To make the situation even worse, he's standing on top of a hill balancing on a log! Survive for as long as you can and get the highest score!

Medals :

Bronze - below 150 points

Silver - above 150 points

Gold - above 700 points

Diamond - above 1000 points

To unlock the ending, get 1000 points then lose the game.
